front.title: •Obi-Wan's Apparition
front.gametext: Use 4 Force to deploy on any site if opponent is generating at least 3 Force more than you. At that site, adjacent sites and same sites as Obi-Wan, players activate Force only if they have presence.
front.lore: 'Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter.' The inner consciousness of a Jedi can transcend even death.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
